TEBD examplesÂ¶

A description of the iTEBD examples is to follow here.

  • Finite system groundstate
  • Finite system time-evolution (quantum walk)
  • Finite system time-evolution with conserved number (conserved walk)
  • Infinite system groundstate (spin-half and AKLT)
  • Driven & Dissipative system (driving of XY-model with bath at ends)
  • pure
    • conservedwalk module
    • finite-spin-half-heisenberg module
    • quantumwalk module
    • spin-1-AKLT module
    • spin-half-heisenberg module
    • spinful-hubbard module
    • time-dependent-ham module
  • mixed
    • opendriving module
    • spin-half-heisenberg module
